original_text: Anyone belonging to Jeroboam who dies in the city the dogs shall eat, and anyone who dies in the open country the birds of the heavens shall eat, for the Lord has spoken it.”’
korean_text: 여로보암에게 속한 자가 성읍에서 죽은즉 개가 먹고 들에서 죽은즉 공중의 새가 먹으리니 이는 여호와께서 말씀하셨음이니라 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: Anyone belonging to Jeroboam who dies in the city
sentences.korean_translation: 성 안에서 죽는 여로보암에게 속한 자는

sentences.original_text: and anyone who dies in the open country
the birds of the heavens shall eat
for the Lord has spoken it.”’
